results.title: Association Between Subclinical Hypothyroidism and the Prognosis of Diabetes Mellitus and Subsequent Complications: A Retrospective Cohort Study
results.text_hl: As for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use, 74.1% of the @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SCH@@@ group and 50.0% of the non-@<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SCH@@@ group were on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, with this difference being statistically significant (p=0.047).

citations.NLM: Alharbi M, Alsaleem HN, Almuhaisni R, Alzeadi HS, Alsamani RI, Alhammad SI, Alharbi AM. Association Between Subclinical Hypothyroidism and the Prognosis of Diabetes Mellitus and Subsequent Complications: A Retrospective Cohort Study Cureus. 2023 Nov;15(11):e48329. PMID: 38060705
citations.BibTeX: @article{38060705, title={Association Between Subclinical Hypothyroidism and the Prognosis of Diabetes Mellitus and Subsequent Complications: A Retrospective Cohort Study}, author={Alharbi M and Alsaleem HN and Almuhaisni R and Alzeadi HS and Alsamani RI and Alhammad SI and Alharbi AM}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={11}, pages={e48329}}

results.title: Metformin reduces autoimmune antibody levels in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we conducted a systematic review and meta-analysis to evaluate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reduce the levels of TPOAb and TgAb in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@subclinical hypothyroidism@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SH@@@), so as to provide a theoretical basis for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment of these diseases.

citations.NLM: Jia X, Zhai T, Zhang JA. Metformin reduces autoimmune antibody levels in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Autoimmunity. 2020 Sep;53(6):353-361. PMID: 32741222
citations.BibTeX: @article{32741222, title={Metformin reduces autoimmune antibody levels in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis: A systematic review and meta-analysis.}, author={Jia X and Zhai T and Zhang JA}, journal={Autoimmunity}, volume={53}, number={6}, pages={353-361}}

results.title: Thyroid dysfunction and its association with microvascular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus in south India.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@Subclinical hypothyroidism@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SCH@@@) was more frequent in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (16.2% vs 7.6%, p = 0.007) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users (9.6% vs 18.7%, p = 0.0044).

citations.NLM: Reddy N, Pradeep TVS, Tirupati S, Sarathi V, Kumar D. Thyroid dysfunction and its association with microvascular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus in south India. Diabetes Metab Syndr. 2020 Jul-Aug;14(4):615-617. PMID: 32422445
citations.BibTeX: @article{32422445, title={Thyroid dysfunction and its association with microvascular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus in south India.}, author={Reddy N and Pradeep TVS and Tirupati S and Sarathi V and Kumar D}, journal={Diabetes Metab Syndr}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={615-617}}

results.title: Metformin effect on TSH in subclinical hypothyroidism: randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ effect on TSH in @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@subclinical hypothyroidism@@@: randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial.

results.title: Effect of metformin on thyroid function tests in patients with subclinical hypothyroidism: an open-label randomised controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on thyroid function tests in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@subclinical hypothyroidism@@@: an open-label randomised controlled trial.

results.title: The effect of metformin on the hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis in women with polycystic ovary syndrome and subclinical hypothyroidism.

results.title: Effects of treatment with metformin on TSH levels: a meta-analysis of literature studies.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ induces a reduction in TSH levels both in overt and in @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@subclinical hypothyroidism@@@.

citations.NLM: Lupoli R, Di Minno A, Tortora A, Ambrosino P, Lupoli GA, Di Minno MN. Effects of treatment with metformin on TSH levels: a meta-analysis of literature studies. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2014 Jan;99(1):E143-8. PMID: 24203069
